name: Rattle - 3h jam
description:
Hi!

We make this game in 3 hours for the TriJam#123. The theme was "Hide or get Caugh". We approach the idea of a little cat run away from the shadow and the light helps you to get to the finish. 

You have time to finish every level or the shadow will consume you.

Our team is:

Programming : David López @davidlopezdev

Art: Candela Cabrera @_Candiyh

Design: Néstor Alonso @NesAloRo

Enjoy it!

CONTROLS:

WASD -> Move controls

Mouse -> Direction
